Headline: #75 74th/75th Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 76th/Loomis
ShortDescription: Eastbound 75 74th/75th buses are temporarily rerouted via 74th, Racine, then resume their normal route, due to street blockage near 76th/Loomis.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Eastbound #75 74th/75th buses are temporarily rerouted via 74th, Racine, then resume their normal route, due to street blockage near 76th/Loomis.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Midway-bound Orange Line Delays
ShortDescription: Midway-bound Orange Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier door problem at Ashland. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Midway-bound Orange Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier door problem at Ashland.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
